name: final_project
description: /* @route GET api/contacts @desc Get all users contacts @access Private  */

scripts.installAll: yarn install && yarn --cwd ./server install && yarn --cwd ./client install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: set NODE_ENV=production && npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm run heroku-build --prefix client && npm run heroku-postbuild --server

author: iWhiteN, iamr0man, khanbabaev, AlexRusanov, Vlad-Udovenko, vashenko49
